author: devjiwonchoi
message:
[dev-overlay] add disabled backround-color for toolbar buttons (#76555)

### Why?

The disabled button was hard to distinguish from clickable buttons
before hovering.

| Light | Dark |
|--------|--------|
| ![CleanShot 2025-02-26 at 23 10
43@2x](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9c393c6a-979f-436d-be74-e275cc63bb20)
| ![CleanShot 2025-02-26 at 23 08
51@2x](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/97c86b6d-7c47-4ebb-8b3d-1101075dab44)
|

Closes NDX-917
